info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berks and northwestern Lehigh Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wanamakers, or 13 miles southeast of Tamaqua, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kutztown, Lenhartsville, Jordan Valley, Wanamakers, Emerald, New Tripoli and Claussville. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 34 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
